name: QUACKTANGLED
description:
Welcome to QUACKTANGLED!

It's a tile-based puzzle game where you have to unite 2 ducks together at the goal.

The ducks move together, but secondary duck moves to opposite direction. It means you have to take both of them into account while moving.

This game was made by superbnoobster for Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2021 in 48 hours.

The browser version has a minor sound bug (custom pitching is not working - all sounds are in same pitch). So playing downloadable version is recommended.

The source code of this game can be found at: https://github.com/AliYil/gmtkjam21

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • R to restart level
